ability.Razor Wings: Boosts the power of Flying-type moves by 30% and increases accuracy by 1 stage.
ability.Spike Rage: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Attack increases by 50% and it becomes immune to status conditions.

Wing Slash.effect: Has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.

Tail Spike.effect: Has a 30% chance to cause the target to bleed, dealing damage of 1/16 of its max HP at the end of each turn for 3 turns.

Savage Bite.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Pounce.effect: Increases the user's Speed by 1 stage.
